歐羅巴航空機長誤傳劫機 荷蘭機場一度封鎖

07 Nov 2019, 04:51

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月07日訊】西班牙歐羅巴航空一架班機的機長6日晚間誤傳警報，導致荷蘭阿姆斯特丹的史基普機場啟動安全措施實施封鎖，期間媒體也一度傳出疑似發生劫機事件。所幸只是機長「搞烏龍」，所有乘客與機組員均已安全下機。
荷蘭憲兵稍早表示，正在調查史基普機場一架飛機上的「可疑情況」。英國和荷蘭媒體傳出報導說，疑似有持刀男子意圖劫持班機。
歐羅巴航空（Air Europa）隨後發布聲明說：「今晚由阿姆斯特丹飛往馬德里的一班飛機誤傳警報，導致機場採取安全措施。沒有理由恐慌，所有乘客都很好，正在等待班機起飛。」
聲明再一次強調：「我們很抱歉，沒有理由恐慌。」
史基普機場（Schiphol）是歐洲第3忙碌的機場，僅次於倫敦的希斯羅機場（Heathrow）和巴黎的戴高樂機場（Charles de Gaulle Airport）。

Europa captain missed the hijacking

07 Nov 2019, 04:51

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 07, 2019] The captain of a flight of Europa Airlines in Spain misjudged the alarm on the evening of the 6th, which led to the implementation of the security measures imposed by the Schiphol Airport in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. During the media, the media also reported a suspected hijacking. event. Fortunately, only the captain "made an oolong", all passengers and crew members have safely disembarked.
The Dutch military police said earlier that they were investigating "suspicious circumstances" on a plane at Schiphol Airport. The British and Dutch media reported that it was suspected that a knife man intended to hijack a flight.
Air Europa subsequently issued a statement saying: "A flight from Amsterdam to Madrid mis-transmitted the alarm tonight, resulting in security measures at the airport. There is no reason to panic, all passengers are very good, waiting for the flight to take off."
The statement once again stressed: "We are sorry, there is no reason to panic."
Schiphol is the third busiest airport in Europe, behind London's Heathrow and Paris's Charles de Gaulle Airport.



(Editor: Lu Yongxin)
